mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CartItem (cartItemId, cartMemberId, quantity) VALUES (#{cartItemId}, #{cartMemberId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CARTITEMID FROM CARTITEM WHERE CARTMEMBERID = #{memberId}

SELECT ITEM.ITEMID,ITEM.NAME,ITEM.PRICE,ITEM.DESCRIPTION,ITEM.STOCK,ITEM.CATEGORY,ITEM.FNAME,ITEM.FPATH,QUANTITY FROM (SELECT CARTITEMID, SUM(QUANTITY) AS QUANTITY FROM CARTITEM WHERE CARTITEMID = #{itemId} GROUP BY CARTITEMID) LEFT JOIN ITEM ON ITEM.ITEMID = CARTITEMID
